Pre-Game Insights: South Africa played their first game against Zimbabwe in which they were in a comfortable position to snatch the match but rain played a spoiler and the match went to no result in the end.

On the other hand Bangladesh won their first match of Super 12 stage against Netherlands where their batting missed out chances to build some big partnership and played big inning, but their bowling did a quite predictable work.
There is no update on any player getting injured. Both teams likely
South Africa: Temba Bavuma (c), Quinton de Kock (wk), Rilee Rossouw, Aiden Markram, David Miller, Tristan Stubbs, Wayne Parnell, Keshav Maharaj, Kagiso Rabada, Anrich Nortje, Lungi Ngidi
Bangladesh: Najmul Hossain Shanto, Soumya Sarkar, Litton Das, Shakib Al Hasan(c), Afif Hossain, Yasir Ali, Nurul Hasan(w), Mosaddek Hossain, Taskin Ahmed, Mustafizur Rahman, Hasan Mahmud
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa will lock horns against Bangladesh in the 22nd match of the T20 World Cup 2022 on Thursday, October 27 at Sydney Cricket Ground.
BAN vs SA: Match Details Date – Thursday, October 27, 2022 Time – 08:30 AM IST Venue – Sydney Cricket Ground
BAN vs SA: Where to Watch? Bangladesh and South Africa match will be get broadcasted on the Star Sports network on TV, and Hotstar for Indian viewers.
